## Tooltip.verticalViewportLock property

Controls if the tooltip will always remain fully in the viewport on the vertical axis

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verticalViewportLock: boolean;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: vertical-viewport-lock
